Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.fatwire.gst</groupId>
  <artifactId>gst-foundation</artifactId>
  <version>11.6.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
  <type>${project.packaging</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'com.fatwire.gst:gst-foundation:${project.packaging:11.6.0-SNAPSHOT'

Apache Ant

<dependency org="com.fatwire.gst" name="gst-foundation" rev="11.6.0-SNAPSHOT">
  <artifact name="gst-foundation" type="${project.packaging" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='com.fatwire.gst', module='gst-foundation', version='11.6.0-SNAPSHOT')
)

Grails

compile 'com.fatwire.gst:gst-foundation:11.6.0-SNAPSHOT'

Leiningen

[com.fatwire.gst/gst-foundation "11.6.0-SNAPSHOT"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "com.fatwire.gst" %% "gst-foundation" % "11.6.0-SNAPSHOT"
